title: Площадь лесных пожаров Бурятии превысила 10 тысяч гектаров
text:

8 мая 2025, 12:42
Площадь лесных пожаров Бурятии превысила 10 тысяч гектаров
За прошедшие сутки в Бурятии обнаружено 12 возгораний лесного фонда в восьми районах республики, общая площадь пожаров достигла 10,5 тысячи гектаров.
По оперативным данным Агентства лесного хозяйства Бурятии, на утро 8 мая в республике действует 21 лесной пожар, в том числе в Баунтовском, Джидинском, Еравнинском и Кяхтинском районах.
"Угрозы населённым пунктам нет, пожары низкой интенсивности", – уточнили в Агентстве.
К тушению огня привлечены 388 человек и 92 единицы техники, которым удалось ликвидировать восемь очагов пожаров.
По словам специалистов, причиной возникновения лесных пожаров стало неосторожное обращение с огнем.

author: @gurufocus
title: Archer Advances Hybrid Heliport with Abu Dhabi Terminal Transformation | ACHR Stock News
text:
In a groundbreaking development, Archer (ACHR, Financial) has received a green light from the General Civil Aviation Agency (GCAA) to revamp an existing helipad at an Abu Dhabi Cruise Terminal. The plan is to transform it into a hybrid heliport capable of accommodating both helicopters and electric Vertical Take-Off and Landing (eVTOL) aircraft. This initiative forms part of Archer's collaboration with Falcon Aviation, aimed at establishing the first hybrid heliport for early-stage commercial air taxi services in Abu Dhabi. The move is also a significant addition to Archer's growing infrastructure framework in the UAE.
The GCAA has positioned itself at the forefront of global civil aviation by crafting regulations specifically for hybrid heliports, allowing for the safe and efficient operation of mixed aircraft types. These proposed regulations, currently concluding the consultation phase, are set to be finalized by July 2025. This development heralds a new era for advanced air mobility, facilitating its integration into established aviation networks.
Archer plans to incorporate charging stations and enhance landing and safety systems at the site, ensuring compatibility with eVTOL technology. By upgrading an existing facility, the company benefits from existing airspace regulations and structural setups, thus avoiding the extensive costs and delays that come with constructing new vertiport infrastructures from the ground up.
Wall Street Analysts Forecast
Based on the one-year price targets offered by 8 analysts, the average target price for Archer Aviation Inc (ACHR, Financial) is $11.69 with a high estimate of $13.50 and a low estimate of $4.50. The average target implies an
upside of 45.19%
from the current price of $8.05. More detailed estimate data can be found on the Archer Aviation Inc (ACHR) Forecast page.
Based on the consensus recommendation from 9 brokerage firms, Archer Aviation Inc's (ACHR, Financial) average brokerage recommendation is currently 2.2, indicating "Outperform" status. The rating scale ranges from 1 to 5, where 1 signifies Strong Buy, and 5 denotes Sell.
Key Business Developments
Release Date: February 27, 2025
For the complete transcript of the earnings call, please refer to the full earnings call transcript.
Positive Points
- Archer Aviation Inc (
ACHR,Financial) is on track to begin deploying revenue-generating Midnight aircraft later this year, marking a significant milestone in their commercial strategy. - The company has signed Abu Dhabi Aviation as its first launch edition partner, allowing for early commercial deployment and revenue generation in the UAE.
- Archer Aviation Inc (ACHR) has a strong liquidity position with over $1 billion, bolstered by recent equity raises and investor demand.
- The company is making substantial progress on its Midnight aircraft's type certification program with the FAA, and has also secured FAA certification for its Part 141 flight training academy.
- Archer Aviation Inc (ACHR) is diversifying into the defense sector with a hybrid aircraft development in partnership with Anduril, which is expected to be a multi-billion dollar opportunity.
Negative Points
- The FAA has not yet resolved all industry-wide issues necessary for Archer Aviation Inc (ACHR) to complete its type certification, potentially delaying full-scale operations in the US.
- The company's non-GAAP operating expenses increased by 22% year over year, reflecting significant investments in development and manufacturing scale-up.
- Archer Aviation Inc (ACHR) faces challenges in scaling manufacturing, with plans to produce only up to 10 Midnight aircraft this year, which may not meet early demand.
- The company is still in the testing phase for its Midnight aircraft, with no specific date for the first piloted flight, which could impact timelines for commercial launch.
- There is uncertainty regarding the timeline and financial impact of the defense partnership with Anduril, as specific details and potential revenue from this venture remain undisclosed.

author: Radhika Seth
title: Kate Winslet Plays Model-Turned-War Correspondent Lee Miller
text:
Kate Winslet is all set to take over our screens once again, stepping into the shoes of Lee Miller.
In June 2020, after years of speculation, it was confirmed that Kate Winslet would take on the role of Lee Miller , British Vogue ’s prolific World War II correspondent under the magazine’s formidable editor-in-chief Audrey Withers, in a new Sky Original film directed by Oscar-nominated auteur Ellen Kuras. (Kuras previously worked with Winslet on Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind , for which she served as cinematographer.) Now, the first trailer has finally been released, revealing our first look at Winslet in character as Miller, indefatigable in the face of unimaginable horror.
Titled Lee , the hotly anticipated release will take inspiration from the biography The Lives of Lee Miller by Antony Penrose – Miller’s son with her second husband Roland Penrose, a historian and champion of the Surrealist movement – with The Post ’s Liz Hannah penning the script in collaboration with Lem Dobbs, John Collee, Marion Hume and The Lee Miller Archives. Alongside Winslet as Miller, Alexander Skarsgård will play Roland Penrose (the part had previously gone to Jude Law, but the actor has since departed the project), and Josh O’Connor will take on the part of Antony Penrose. Meanwhile, Andrea Riseborough will appear as Audrey Withers and Marion Cotillard as Solange D’Ayen, the fashion director of French Vogue who was another close ally of Miller’s.
Also joining them? Noémie Merlant as French artist Nusch Éluard; Samuel Barnett as another Vogue contributor, the legendary photographer Cecil Beaton; and Andy Samberg as David E Scherman, who covered the war for Life magazine and worked with Miller on several assignments (he took the now-iconic image of her soaking in the bathtub of Hitler’s Munich apartment in 1945).
The drama’s log line describes it as “not a biopic”, but an exploration of “the most significant decade of Lee Miller’s life” – the period between 1938 and 1948. “As a middle-aged woman, she refused to be remembered as a model and male artists’ muse,” it adds. “She defied the expectations and rules of the time and travelled to Europe to report from the frontline. There, in part as a reaction to her own well-hidden trauma, she used her Rolleiflex camera to give a voice to the voiceless. What Lee captured on film in Dachau and throughout Europe was shocking. Her photographs of the war, its victims and its consequences remain among the most historically important [of the conflict]. She changed war photography forever, but Lee paid an enormous personal price for what she witnessed and the stories she fought to tell.”
Miller famously began her career as a model for American Vogue after Condé Nast himself prevented her from stepping in front of a car in Manhattan and brought her to meet then editor-in-chief Edna Woolman Chase. She later relocated to Paris to study photography under Man Ray – becoming his lover and muse for several years. Following the Blitz, she signed on to be British Vogue ’s official war correspondent. Traveling to France shortly after D-Day, she captured the siege of St Malo; the liberation of Paris; and the opening of Dachau for the magazine’s pages. In spite of her professional success, she experienced depression throughout her life.
As for when this sweeping tale will reach the big screen? 13 September 2024. Mark your calendars now.
Originally published in Vogue.co.uk

author: Il Resto del Carlino
title: Le idee degli alunni fanno la scuola sostenibile
text:
Le idee degli alunni fanno la scuola sostenibile
La salute dell’ambiente ci preoccupa? I cambiamenti climatici ci angosciano? Questo stato d’animo si chiama ’ecoansia’ ed è in crescita soprattutto tra le nuove generazioni.
Per prevenirla e contrastarla può essere utile individuare innanzitutto i problemi ambientali intorno a sé e trovare le soluzioni.
È ciò che hanno fatto due classi – 1^ A e 1^ E – della scuola secondaria di primo grado G. Marconi, che fa parte dell’Istituto comprensivo 10 di Modena, partecipando di recente alla School of sustainability (scuola di sostenibilità). Si tratta di un progetto promosso da Bolton Hope Foundation di Milano e Future Education Modena, due enti specializzati nell’educazione allo sviluppo sostenibile e diffusione delle discipline cosiddette Stem (scientifiche, tecnologiche, ingegneristiche e matematiche).
"L’iniziativa aveva l’obiettivo di fornire ai ragazzi gli strumenti per generare cambiamento, accrescendo le capacità Stem e intervenendo proattivamente sull’ecoansia – spiega Damien Lanfrey, co-fondatore di Future Education Modena con Donatella Solda – Hanno partecipato sessanta classi di 36 scuole in tutt’Italia. Gli istituti di Modena e Reggio Emilia sono tra quelli che hanno presentato i progetti più innovativi e concreti. L’ora di scienze a scuola deve cambiare: School of sustainability non è soltanto un nuovo modo per insegnare l’ambiente, ma un modello educativo che mette al centro le esigenze del territorio, le idee degli studenti e una visione di intelligenza collettiva che lascerà, alla fine del percorso, un segnale tangibile e duraturo nelle città coinvolte".
Alla Marconi i ragazzi della 1^ A e 1^ E, supportati dalle docenti Barbara Guerzoni e Laura Moretti e dagli esperti di Fme, hanno studiato lo spazio intorno alla scuola, calcolato la dispersione energetica e termica nel vialetto di ingresso e nelle strade circostanti. In pratica si sono resi conto di quanto è problematico lo spazio intorno a sé e cosa si potrebbe fare, concretamente, per migliorarlo con alcune soluzioni.
Per esempio, pareti di edera per rinfrescare, alberi ad alto fusto per ripararsi dalle isole di calore, stalli per bici e piste ciclabili per migliorare la mobilità, pannelli fotovoltaici per produrre energia rinnovabile, fontane e specchi d’acqua, panchine e tele ombreggianti, prati erbosi e fiori, pavimentazione esterna con griglia per filtrare l’acqua.
"Abbiamo riprogettato gli spazi, immaginandoli a nostra misura prima sulla carta, poi sul computer – scrivono gli studenti della 1^ A nel report conclusivo – Il nostro progetto parte dai nostri desideri di avere spazi gradevoli e freschi, ma non tiene conto dei costi e vincoli urbanistici della città. Se qualche architetto prendesse in considerazione alcuni di questi aspetti, le nostre scuole migliorerebbero".
"Analizzando la nostra scuola abbiamo notato molte superfici scure, poco verde, zone ampie scarsamente utilizzabili, suolo impermeabile – affermano, invece, i ragazzi della 1^ E - Con il nostro progetto vogliamo suggerire soluzioni basate in particolare sulla natura che contribuiranno a ridurre gli effetti del calore e miglioreranno la vivibilità.
Per questo intendiamo coinvolgere gli altri studenti della scuola, insegnanti, genitori e cittadini del quartiere e presentare i nostri suggerimenti al Comune di Modena".
Silvio Cortesi

author: AB Newswire
title: Leading Provider of Innovative Beverage Pasteurization Solutions, Prowm, Revolutionizes the Industry | dailytimesleader.com | Serving West Point & Clay County Since 1867
text:
Milwaukee, WI - Pro Engineering / Manufacturing Inc. is a leading provider of innovative beverage pasteurization solutions, is pleased to announce the compelling advantages of their state-of-the-art Tunnel and Batch Pasteurizers for co-packing companies looking to enhance their operations.
In today's competitive co-packing industry, quality and efficiency are paramount. With consumers demanding fresher, safer, and more consistently delicious products, co-packing companies are continually seeking ways to meet these expectations. Pro Engineering / Manufacturing Inc. has recognized this need and developed a range of cutting-edge Tunnel and Batch Pasteurizers that offer unparalleled benefits for co-packers.
Pro Engineering / Manufacturing Inc.'s Tunnel Pasteurizers are designed to heat-treat a wide range of beverages including beer, tea, coffee, hard seltzers and more. These systems ensure that products maintain their quality, taste, and nutritional value while meeting the strictest safety standards. Tunnel Pasteurizers from Pro Engineering / Manufacturing Inc. enable co-packing companies to:
Enhance Product Safety: The precise temperature control in Tunnel Pasteurizers eliminates harmful microorganisms, ensuring products are safe for consumers, meet regulatory requirements, and extends shelf life. Improve Quality: Maintaining product quality and taste is crucial. Our pasteurizers achieve this by minimizing the thermal impact on sensitive products, preserving their freshness and flavor. Boost Efficiency: With Pro Engineering / Manufacturing Inc.'s Tunnel Pasteurizers, co-packers can increase their production throughput while reducing labor costs. These systems are designed for optimal efficiency. Expand Product Portfolio: Co-packing companies can diversify their offerings by confidently pasteurizing various products, including those with different packaging formats. In addition to Tunnel Pasteurizers, Pro Engineering / Manufacturing Inc. offers Batch Pasteurizers, which are ideal for smaller batch sizes and specialized products. These versatile systems provide co-packers with the flexibility to experiment with new recipes, develop seasonal items, and cater to niche markets, all while maintaining quality and safety.
Since 1977, Pro Engineering / Manufacturing Inc. has had a long-standing reputation for delivering robust, reliable, and innovative customized beverage equipment. Their Tunnel and Batch Pasteurizers are no exception. Co-packing companies seeking to stay competitive, meet consumer demands, and expand their product offerings should consider partnering with Pro to implement these advanced pasteurization solutions.
For more information about Pro Engineering / Manufacturing Inc. and their Tunnel and Batch Pasteurizers, please visit: https://prowm.com/co-packing-companies-expanding-new-tunnel-batch-pasteurizer/
About Pro:
Pro Engineering / Manufacturing Inc. is a trusted provider of beverage pasteurizers and solutions, specializing in pasteurization systems, conveyor systems, and more. With a commitment to innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction, Pro has been a preferred partner for companies in the beverage industry for since 1977.

author: Eilish O'Regan
title: Experts pour cold water on Olympic athletes’ fondness for ice baths | Irish Independent
text:
Home > Irish News Experts pour cold water on Olympic athletes’ fondness for ice baths
Many athletes believe ice baths aid their recovery. Photo: Getty
Eilish O'Regan Today at 03:30
Athletes at the Olympic games are set to immerse themselves in around €2.5m worth of ice baths or packs to relieve their tired muscles – but questions hang over how effective it is, while it is also bad for the planet, experts warn today.
Cryotherapy – ice treatment – in the form of ice packs, compression pumps, ice baths and cold-water immersion is widely used by athletes and support teams to manage injury and illness, and speed up recovery, said authors from Montpellier University, in the British Journal of Sports Medicine .

author: La Palma Ahora
title: La playa de Santa Cruz de La Palma iza su cuarta bandera azul
text: 0 El alcalde de Santa Cruz de La Palma, Asier Antona, y la concejala de Playa, Omaira Pérez, izaron este viernes, 5 de julio, la Bandera Azul, el distintivo internacional que reconoce la calidad y excelencia tanto de sus aguas como de los servicios que presta. Una actividad en la que también estuvieron presentes el concejal de Fiestas del Ayuntamiento, Raico Arrocha; la edil de Obras, Servicios Públicos y Turismo, Saray González; la concejala de Bienestar Social e Igualdad de Oportunidades, Yéssica Pérez y el edil de Proyectos Estratégicos, Juan José Cabrera. Se trata del cuarto año consecutivo que la playa urbana de la capital palmera ondea este galardón anual desarrollado por la FEE (Federación de Educación Ambiental) y que en España se coordina a través de la Asociación de Educación Ambiental y del Consumidor (Adeac) con la colaboración de la Consejería de Sanidad del Gobierno de Canarias, en el caso de nuestra comunidad autónoma. El alcalde Asier Antona ha puesto de manifiesto esta certificación revalida los servicios y calidad de esta playa que cuenta con más de 1.200 metros de longitud para el disfrute de la población local y visitante, con espacios además para la práctica de deportes náuticos, áreas para otros deportes en arena, zonas de sombra, baños, socorrismo y accesibilidad garantizada. En este sentido, la edil de Playa de Santa Cruz de La Palma, Omaira Pérez, recalca que la iniciativa de la Bandera Azul tiene alcance y prestigio internacional, en el que participan 2.000 municipios de 45 países, que promueven un fin común, como es ofrecer la máxima calidad y seguridad en el litoral. De hecho, durante el tiempo en el que la playa capitalina cuenta con este distintivo, la calidad del agua siempre ha sido excelente y nunca se han recibido informes negativos sobre este aspecto. Cabe recordar que Santa Cruz de La Palma obtuvo su primera bandera azul en 2021 y que en el último año se han incrementado los esfuerzos y recursos en cuanto a limpieza, mantenimiento y socorrismo para garantizar una experiencia integral en el litoral palmero.
